description: The VERIFICATION table contains information about your verification records. These records include verification information for patients, guarantors, coverages, coverage members, hospital accounts, and encounters.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the verification record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: VERIF_RECORD_INI
columns.description: INI of the verified record

columns.name: VERIF_RECORD_IDNT
columns.description: ID of the verified record. This item is not networked, because it can contain an EPT, EAR, CVG, or HAR ID, depending on the verification type.

columns.name: VERIFICATION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The verification type of the record. This can be patient, encounter, guarantor, hospital account, coverage, or member.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient


Patient Encounter


Guarantor


Hospital Account


Coverage


Coverage Member


Hospital Account 2


Patient Encounter Benefits


Coverage Encounter Benefits

columns.name: VERIF_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current verification status


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LAST_VERIF_DATETIME
columns.description: Date and time of the last successful verification

columns.name: LAST_VERIF_USER_ID
columns.description: User who performed the most recent verification

columns.name: NEXT_REVIEW_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the verification status needs review

columns.name: LAST_STAT_CHNG_DTTM
columns.description: The date on which the status was last changed

columns.name: LAST_CHANGE_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who last changed the verification status

columns.name: ENC_PAT_ID
columns.description: ID for the patient of this encounter

columns.name: ENC_PAT_VERIF_ID
columns.description: Verification record for the encounter patient

columns.name: ENC_CSN
columns.description: Contact Serial Number (CSN) for the patient encounter associated with the verification. Applies to encounter and hospital account verification.

columns.name: ENC_GUARANTOR_ID
columns.description: Responsible guarantor for this encounter

columns.name: ENC_GUAR_VERIF_ID
columns.description: Verificaition record for the guarantor of this encounter

columns.name: ENC_GUAR_SNAPSHOT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the encounter guarantor at the time the encounter was verified


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: VERIF_STATUS_C_NAME

columns.name: ENC_HOSP_ACCT_ID
columns.description: Hospital account for this encounter

columns.name: ENC_HAR_VERIF_ID
columns.description: Verification record of the hospital account for this encounter

columns.name: ENC_PAT_SNAPSHOT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the patient at the time the encounter or hospital account was verified.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: VERIF_STATUS_C_NAME

columns.name: VERIF_SUBTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The verification subtype of the record. Subtypes can include things like address or BSN. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Address


BSN


Contact Information

columns.name: SUB_PARENT_VRX_ID
columns.description: The parent verification record of the subtype verification record.

columns.name: SUB_ORIGIN_EAF_ID
columns.description: The origin EAF ID of the subtype verification record. This could be the location, service area, or facility where the subtypes are defined.

columns.name: LAST_SELF_VERIF_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the verification status was changed the last time by patient (using the Welcome kiosk).
